dEqvairvasu#BiH saqjOShA$H prIqtaM ~Mvahni#M ~Mvahatu jAqtavE#dAH || 
stIqrNam baqrq.hiH suqShTarI#mA juShAqNOru pRuqthu pratha#mAnaM pRuthiqvyAM | 
dEqvEBi#ryuqktamadi#tiH saqjOShA$H syOqnaM kRu#NvAqnA su#viqtE da#dhAtu ||
EqtA u# vaH suqBagA# viqSvarU#pAq vipakShO#BiqH Sraya#mANAq udAtai$H |
RuqShvAH saqtIH kaqvaShaqH SumBa#mAnAq dvArO# dEqvIH su#prAyaqNA Ba#vantu ||
aqntaqrA miqtrAvaru#NAq cara#ntIq muKa#M ~Myaqj~jAnA#maqBi sa#M~MvidAqnE | 
uqShAsA# vA(gm) - [  ] 57
